chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
isPR 2 Init.Nat.mul

Premises:
Module Init := Struct Definition Unconvertible : forall A : Type, A -> A -> Set. Definition unconvertible : forall (A : Type) (a b : A), Unconvertible A a b -> unit. End 
Module Nat := Struct Definition t : Set. Definition zero : nat. Definition one : nat. Definition two : nat. Definition succ : nat -> nat. Definition pred : nat -> nat. Definition add : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition double : nat -> nat. Definition mul : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition sub : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition eqb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition leb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition ltb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition compare : nat -> nat -> comparison. Definition max : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition min : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition even : nat -> bool. Definition odd : nat -> bool. Definition pow : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition tail_add : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition tail_addmul : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat. Definition tail_mul : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition of_uint_acc : Decimal.uint -> nat -> nat. Definition of_uint : Decimal.uint -> nat. Definition to
isPR : forall n : nat, naryFunc n -> Set
Nat.mul_wd = PeanoNat.Nat.mul_wd_obligation_1 : Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq eq)) Init.Nat.mul
Init.Nat.mul = fix mul (n m : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => 0 | S p => m + mul p m end : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Init.Nat.mul (_ _)%nat_scope
compose2_2IsPR : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 f -> forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> forall h : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 h -> isPR 2 (fun x y : nat => h (f x y) (g x y))
compose2_4IsPR : forall f1 : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 f1 -> forall f2 : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 f2 -> forall f3 : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 f3 -> forall f4 : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 f4 -> forall g : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 4 g -> isPR 2 (fun x y : nat => g (f1 x y) (f2 x y) (f3 x y) (f4 x y))
compose2_3IsPR : forall f1 : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 f1 -> forall f2 : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 f2 -> forall f3 : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 f3 -> forall g : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 3 g -> isPR 2 (fun x y : nat => g (f1 x y) (f2 x y) (f3 x y))
swapIsPR : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 f -> isPR 2 (fun x y : nat => f y x)
compose2_1IsPR : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 f -> forall g : nat -> nat, isPR 1 g -> isPR 2 (fun x y : nat => g (f x y))

filter110IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 3 (fun a b _ : nat => g a b)
filter011IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 3 (fun _ b c : nat => g b c)
filter101IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 3 (fun a _ c : nat => g a c)
filter0011IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 4 (fun _ _ c d : nat => g c d)
filter1100IsPR : forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 4 (fun a b _ _ : nat => g a b)
compose1_2IsPR : forall f : nat -> nat, isPR 1 f -> forall f' : nat -> nat, isPR 1 f' -> forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 1 (fun x : nat => g (f x) (f' x))
pi1_2IsPR = let H : 1 < 2 := le_n 2 in exist (fun p : PrimRec 2 => extEqual 2 (evalPrimRec 2 p) (fun a _ : nat => a)) (projFunc 2 1 H) (fun c _ : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 2 (fun a _ : nat => a)
compose3_2IsPR : forall f1 : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 3 f1 -> forall f2 : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 3 f2 -> forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 3 (fun x y z : nat => g (f1 x y z) (f2 x y z))
pi2_2IsPR = let H : 0 < 2 := le_S 1 1 (le_n 1) in exist (fun p : PrimRec 2 => extEqual 2 (evalPrimRec 2 p) (fun _ b : nat => b)) (projFunc 2 0 H) (fun _ c0 : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 2 (fun _ b : nat => b)
ind1ParamIsPR : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 3 f -> forall g : nat -> nat, isPR 1 g -> isPR 2 (fun a b : nat => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => nat) (g b) (fun x y : nat => f x y b) a)
compose4_2IsPR : forall f1 : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 4 f1 -> forall f2 : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 4 f2 -> forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 4 (fun w x y z : nat => g (f1 w x y z) (f2 w x y z))
indIsPR : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 f -> forall g : nat, isPR 1 (fun a : nat => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => nat) g (fun x y : nat => f x y) a)
ind2ParamIsPR : forall f : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 4 f -> forall g : nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 2 g -> isPR 3 (fun a b c : nat => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => nat) (g b c) (fun x y : nat => f x y b c) a)
compose1_3IsPR : forall f1 : nat -> nat, isPR 1 f1 -> forall f2 : nat -> nat, isPR 1 f2 -> forall f3 : nat -> nat, isPR 1 f3 -> forall g : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat, isPR 3 g -> isPR 1 (fun x : nat => g (f1 x) (f2 x) (f3 x))
compose1_1IsPR : forall f : nat -> nat, isPR 1 f -> forall g : nat -> nat, isPR 1 g -> isPR 1 (fun x : nat => g (f x))
pi3_4IsPR = let H : 1 < 4 := le_S 2 3 (le_S 2 2 (le_n 2)) in exist (fun p : PrimRec 4 => extEqual 4 (evalPrimRec 4 p) (fun _ _ c _ : nat => c)) (projFunc 4 1 H) (fun _ _ c1 _ : nat => eq_refl) : isPR 4 (fun _ _ c _ : nat => c)
